sentences.english: The whole wardrobe door on the door, then the train made a beautiful articles.
sentences.chinese: 有門的整體衣櫃，則在趟門上做起了美麗文章。

sentences.english: There was a time when the only color in my closet was black.
sentences.chinese: 曾經有一段時間，我的衣櫃裏是清一色的黑色。

sentences.english: She hung her coat hurriedly in the hall closet.
sentences.chinese: 她一把把大衣掛回衣櫃。

sentences.english: We  have restaurant-style metal shelves in our closet.
sentences.chinese: 在我們的衣櫃裏有餐廳式金屬架。

sentences.english: It adds some great contrast to the white linens and wardrobes.
sentences.chinese: 和白色的衣櫃和牀形成了對比。

sentences.english: Huge master bath with double sinks and large closet.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的主浴具有雙槽和大衣櫃。

sentences.english: She crossed the room and opened a door to the clothes-closet. She reached for a clothes hanger.
sentences.chinese: 她走過房間打開衣櫃的一扇門，想取一個衣架。

sentences.english: A large press, inlaid with agate and lapis-lazuli, filled one.
sentences.chinese: 一個鑲嵌着瑪瑙和琉璃的大衣櫃佔滿了牆的一角。

sentences.english: It has three large closets, one walk-in.
sentences.chinese: 臥室設有三個大衣櫃，其中一個爲步入式衣櫃。

sentences.english: It has three large closets, one walk-in.
sentences.chinese: 臥室設有三個大衣櫃，其中一個爲步入式衣櫃。

sentences.english: What if it slithered to the top of the wardrobe and dropped down from above?
sentences.chinese: 或者，那條蛇要是先爬到衣櫃上然後再從上面下來呢？

sentences.english: Let me open the locker for you.
Add a touch of green to your environment and wardrobe.
sentences.chinese: 在你的生活環境和衣櫃等增加一抹綠色吧。

sentences.english: Even your wardrobe turns against you.
sentences.chinese: 連你的衣櫃也跟你對着幹。

sentences.english: Clothes and bedding not stored in a wardrobe in the camphor ball .
sentences.chinese: 衣着被褥不要存放在有樟腦球的衣櫃中。

sentences.english: If you don't need the clothes , hang them back in the wardrobe .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不需要這些衣服，就掛回衣櫃裏去。
